objects.comment1: map objects should have 4 params, same as setBounds, as it uses that. for corner snapping
objects.comment1.5: set to desired corner, or middle (m) (topLeft: x:l y: t, bottomLeft: x: l  y: m, etc.
objects.comment2: var a is for anchoring the panel, so its not always centered and allows for better placements if needed
objects.comment3: For sizes, use any int value or use s for the entire size of the given dimension !!WIP!!
